nearby-pages-noresults: Quiet out here... There weren't any pages found with nearby topics.
nearby-pages-noresults-guidance: Try creating a new page or adding location to an existing one
nearby-pages-permission-denied: You have denied access to Location Services for {{SITENAME}}. To change this please visit your browser or device settings
nearby-pages-location-unavailable: {{SITENAME}} cannot determine your location. Please try again with a better signal.
nearby-pages-requirements: Sorry! Your web browser doesn't support {{SITENAME}} Nearby.
nearby-pages-requirements-guidance: Try a different browser or enable JavaScript if you've disabled it.
nearby-pages-info-description: You can read interesting {{SITENAME}} pages about places around you
